CustomField.description: ClaimsV2 73 Capture the Initial Response Time in Days - calculating only the business days between HOIS Issue date and POP Received Date
CustomField.formula: MAX( (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Initial_HOIS_Issue_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Initial_HOIS_Issue_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( POPReceivedDate__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( POPReceivedDate__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) ,0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Difference between initial HOIS Issue Date and P.O.P Received Date
CustomField.label: Initial Response Time (days)
